title: Oxford Dictionary of National Biography
content:
[http://www.nytimes.com/2004/09/23/books/23dnb.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525002541/http:/www.nytimes.com/2004/09/23/books/23dnb.html)   
   
an amazing work of 60 volumes has been completed by Oxford. does anyone know its typography? there's a sample page here ( [http://www.oxforddnb.com/oxforddnb/info/print/psample/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525002541/http:/www.oxforddnb.com/oxforddnb/info/print/psample/)) but unfortunately illegible.
author: abenoboy
